overview: We follow a woman named Evalyn after she finds a photo album in a vintage shop. Within the  photos is a memory she canâ€™t remember, and upon seeing the images, she begins to hear the memories  other people have also forgotten. A stranger named Laura becomes a friend and helps Evalyn master  her psychic ability, allowing her to experience the memories with all of her senses. As her skills improve,  she searches for answers as to how the photos are connected to her memories.

production_companies.name: Loyola University New Orleans Film Department

tagline: Upon discovering a connection to a memory she cannot remember, Evalyn gains a rare psychic ability to experience other people's lost memories. With the help of a sympathetic stranger, she learns to use her new ability in search of her own lost memory.
title: Nothing Is Lost
